name: HALLWAYS
description: This is one of my favorite syntax crystal word pyramids. I keep coming back for the repetition on this one. If you squint your eyes a little bit you can almost use the letters to create angles within the words, which creates even more dimension within the artwork. There's a myriad of ways we could have made this, but I decided to space the letters out. It accentuates the corridors between the letters, like little hallways. The way we could verbally say this visual poem: In HALLWAYS, in ALL WAYS are ALWAYS AWAYS AWAY. This work could be a sculpture with the right construction. Things to think about for a future project.
